info.brief_description: interactive story of sexual encounters for characters in Bluey.
info.description:
Interactive story of sexual encounters for characters in Bluey.
For those who enjoyed the show, this is an open interactive story to allow people to write pairings of any characters from the show. This can include m/f, m/m, f/f, adult, cub, and any content within so have fun.
As a result of this story will contain adult themes not suitable for young viewers, themes may include:
Incest, young characters, fetishes… please be please be aware of others and respect any additions they make. Please don’t add content for shock value and try to keep it within the logic of the characters/show (I know its a porn story but still).

One rule: NO GORE/SNUFF! thank you.
